stories.title: Responsibilities of a Senior Software Engineer

stories.text:
Hello everyone. I've recently made a post about challenges of talking to users and decided to make another post. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31178577

I think it's interesting topic and I want to learn more about it.

So, I've made lists of problems that I've found for now:

- Getting users to do 1-on-1 interviews more frequently - Parse & group users requests by topics (by features, by bugs) - Targeting subset of users: users who are willing to pay, users who stopped using a product, users who like product but won't be paying. - Instantly reaching out to users

Do you know some other problems ?
stories.title: What problems do you have when talking with your users?
A bot that transforms black and white photos into color using AI

stories.text:
I'm aware of some alternate web front-ends, and I've seen some tools on Show HN.

What are you using? What have you built? What would you like to use?
